name: lasagna
directs: Prepare in oven and bake in dish for 45 mins at 350 degC
desc: A pasta dish with sauce, meat, cheese, and other ingredients.

name: cheese burger
ingdts: bun, beef patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles
directs: Grill the beef patty until cooked to desired level. Place cheese on patty to melt. Assemble the burger with the remaining ingredients.
desc: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese and served on a bun with various toppings.

name: mac and cheese
ingdts: macaroni pasta, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, flour
directs: Cook pasta. Make a roux with butter and flour, add milk and cheese to create a sauce. Mix in cooked pasta.
desc: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish made with macaroni and a rich cheddar cheese sauce.
